title: falsch, aber anders lustig
overview: Laugh until the tears come: In this unique comedy show, it's not who's right that counts, but who has the best sense of humor. Two teams of two comedians compete in a witty battle for the most absurd answers to crazy questions. The comedy highlight is hosted by Moritz Neumeier - known for his biting humor and spot-on punchlines. "Wrong, but funny in a different way" guarantees entertainment at the highest level.
